rows.label: qev200801_MSG0002
rows.name:
I take it you are here because you completed all the
trials I assigned you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then you are a BLADE worthy of possessing my
greatest invention. My...masterpiece.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_MSG0004
rows.name:
The mechanical field skill, capable of unraveling
every mystery this enigmatic world can offer![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_MSG0005
rows.name:
I can install the skill straight to your
mimeosome immediately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that you still need to emotionally prepare yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_MSG0007
rows.name:
Fair enough. Being able to see everything means you
will no doubt see some things you'd rather not.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_MSG0008
rows.name:
Return to me once you have steeled yourself to bear the
burden of that knowledge.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_MSG0010
rows.name:
With this, you will become host to the sum total of
human wisdom, built up since the dawn of history![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev200801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Now I must excuse myself. I look forward to news of
your continued exploits.[ST:wait ]
